dct_title_s: Map of the United States of America
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the United States of America : including Canada and a large portion of Texas showing the base, meridian and township lines of the United State surveys, the lands allotted to the Indian tribes west of the Mississippi / compiled from surveys at the United States land office ...by J. Calvin Smith.
dct_description_sm: Insets: Map of North America, southern part of Florida.
Pictorial border. Linen-backed, folded into cover.
Engraved views of American towns around margins.
Entered according to act of Congress 1843.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
